description: A good BDSM scene does not require you to buy expensive equipment like stocks, or toys like floggers, or even bind someone with rope or chains. Mistress January Frost demonstrates how you can create a fulfilling scene using just your own voice, body, and bare hands. Utilize whatever clothing or furniture surrounds you. Take control with commands and corrections. Use your eyes and improvise. True dominance knows no bounds.
title: BDSM Unbound: Kink Without Ties or Tools
